www.datascienceanywhere.com
Smoothing Filters
Blurring 

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Gaussian Blur
Smoothing Filter

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Gaussian Blur
‚Ä¢ Step-1: Define ùëò√ó ùëòsliding window on top of the image.
‚Ä¢ ùëòis always odd number
‚Ä¢ Step-2: Slide the window from left to right and top to bottom
‚Ä¢ Step-3: For each stride (usually stride =1), pixel at the center of the 
matrix is weight mean, where neighbourhood pixels that are closer 
to the central pixel contribute more ‚Äúweight‚Äù to the average.

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Gaussian Blur
‚Ä¢ In 2-D, an isotropic Gaussian has the form:

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Gaussian Blur Kernel
3 x 3
5 x 5

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Gaussian Blur Kernel
‚Ä¢ As kernel size increases blur effect increases
